text: Table 2 Clinical evidence for the benefits of anaesthetic preconditioning Surgical groups studied Off-pump CABG On-pump CABG Non-coronary graft cardiac surgery Paediatric cardiac surgery Biochemical markers Myocardial lactate reduced Troponin I reduced CK MB reduced BNP reduced Free radical production reduced Cardiac output monitoring and TOE/TTE showed reduced wall akinesis echocardiographic TDI show better LV function Oxygen utilization improved Cardiac indices improved Clinical Inotropes requirement reduced Ventilated time reduced Incidence of MI reduced Hospital and ICM stay reduced No mortality data yet though
